subject: Carbon fiber heel plate
description_text:
hi, I bought the  simsonn pro x pedals 6 months ago, but my feet are a bit
low and I would need a heel plate, my question is whether the heel plate
that you sell on your site includes screws and everything needed to be
installed, or does it just come with the plate itself. Note: I'm referring
to the carbon fiber heel plate, the one that is only placed in front of the
pedals, the one you have for sale for 28 dollars, not the base plate

conversations.body_text: Hi David Munteanu,    Don't worry, when you purchase the Carbon fiber heel plate separately, you will receive the necessary accessories free of charge.

Hi again, i have another question about the simsonn carbon fiber heel
plate. Can it be mounted without the baseplate? and could you give me some
dimensions of the heel plate from one hole to another, so I know if it can
be mounted on my rig?


On Wed, 2 Jul 2025 at 12:51, service@simsonn.com
